select cafe_id, count(like_count) like_count from userslikecafe where cafe_id = #{cafe_id}
mapper.delete: delete from userslikecafe where users_id = #{users_id} and cafe_id = #{cafe_id}
mapper.select: select m.mid menu_id, count(ulm.like_count) like_count from menu m join userslikemenu ulm on m.mid = ulm.menu_id and m.mid = #{mid} group by menu_id
